channel.title: Rise and fall
channel.description:
[center]Ok, So I'll be updating this topic as I continue to write more. Pretty much a free style of the past 3 years. Post criticism, comments, changes I could make, or just personal opinion. Enjoy.[/center]
[center] [b] [size=24pt]Rise and Fall[/size][/b] [size=18pt][b]A nations struggle to keep fighting[/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Chapter One Uprise[/size][/center]
[center] December 7th, 2007. A day in history I will never forget. A day in which all our freedom was taken. We were now oppressed people. There was nothing we could do. The government officials had finally implemented a set of laws that would prevent our freedom. They just wanted to make the country safe. They wanted a country with a healthy, living, economy. Little did they know they where about to throw their entire economy right into the pit of hell.
For years now, illegal trades had been involved, which was said to be collapsing the economy. People from foreign lands would come into the nation and work for hours, even days on end, just to bring back resources and money to their home country. Our officials disagreed with this. They said the resources are for our people, not these slaves. So they began to implement a set of laws that would, hopefully, prevent these actions and keep our economy, and nation, at peace.
At the same time as these immigrants, crime was continuing to increase. People tricking others into giving them items, or basic sleight of hand tricks, to make the value seem the same as offered, while it may actually be incredibly lower. The country was in havock. These people, known as "scammers", were the other primary targets of this economic establishment about to be made.
In October, government officials had officially decided pricing for every item that flowed through their economy, legal or not. Every item we owned had a set price. Every person could now be classified by their riches. They watched us, to see how we react. Scammers were furious, as now basic villagers could catch the craftyness the scammers. But while this was a big jump in the decreasing of scammers, it did not affect the immigrants, and would only be the beginning for the scammers.
North of our civilized area is a land known as the "wilderness". It used be just like the rest of Gieilinor: a thriving, upbeat area. But that was long ago, back in the days of the Zamorak and Saradomin. After an intense arguement which lead to a fight between them, only black sut lay across the ground of the region, with all of the water replaced with scalding water. Officials had decided to make this land "law free". Killing of other people was now freely allowed, and greatly taken advantage of. It was a popular place, suprisingly. People even made a living off of the items taken from dead bodies they had just slain.
December 7th, 2007. A nation in upset, outcry and pure rage. The money tracking system had been given limits, meaning that not only did items have an official worth, they could only be exanged for so much or so little. People who made a living off of merchanting were soon to be broke. But that wasn't the true issue. The wilderness, the area that had been law free for so long, was now being enforced as a friendly area, and killing would be no longer allowed. People dissapeared that day. Over 100,000 people vanished. Some left to other lands. Some simply killed themself. The land of Gieilinor was in complete chaos. But the goverment would do nothing.
They said it was for the best. Removing our freedom to exchange items, and our freedom to cut each other into little pieces at our risk. The wilderness was claimed to be a high area of "illegal transport", and must therefor be made a friendly place. That didn't the dragons would give you their bones, but all killing of your own race must be stopped. Every form of high quantity risking or trading between people had been completely removed.
The worst part about all of this was that we were powerless. People held riots in towns, yelling and shouting, hoping someone would listen, hoping things would change. But for the time being, they wouldn't. Our economy would be under total control. The nation had gone from a democracy to a dictatorship. Some say it happened overnight. I, however, disagree. This had been coming together for months, the ultimate scheme to keep their little nation safe and healthy. But we weren't healthy. We were in oppression. And we wanted out of it.[/center]

item.title: Rise and fall
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Some grammatical and flow errors, but an interesting read. Nice job.

Read full topic

item.title: Rise and fall
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:16, topic:379445”]You could try http://docs.google.com instead of open office or ms office. Works just as well, if not better (than open office, anyway).

Yeah, I just skimmed through it. I like your perspective and your writing style. It’s an easy read, and it has nice flow. I would be cautious when referring to the history of RuneScape, unless you really know it well. It’s rather complex, as you go back in ages and centuries. Nevertheless though, you have good organization. It’ll be great to read more!

Have you thought about posting this on the RS forums?[/quote]

Thanks.

I was going to post it on forums, just testing it for feedback here first.

Read full topic

Have you thought about posting this on the RS forums?

item.title: Rise and fall
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

IlikeArrays:

LOL. Way too much thought is going into this bullshit story “rise and fall”. You seem like runescape is your life.

you care, bro?

Ix Soulcist xI:

I’m kind of confused about this story, I don’t understand how it relates to RuneScape? I can see some parts that might relate to it but others, I do not.

The citizens are supposedly players with the higher authority being FaGex. When he said the citizens moved to other lands, I assume me meant other games by that.
You just need to think about it a bit and it will all be really clear

Read full topic

item.title: Rise and fall
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

IlikeArrays:

LOL. Way too much thought is going into this bullshit story “rise and fall”. You seem like runescape is your life.

Wow, not really.
I’ve played rs on and off since 04, but it has never affected my personal life, except spending money on membership.
Like I said, when I’m bored, I write. Seeing as free trade was coming back, I figured I’d put something together.
Now stop being a douche.

Read full topic

item.title: Rise and fall
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:10, topic:379445”]It’s ok, just work on it a bit more
also, try to expand a bit in the end when the riots started. Explain how citizens felt, how many left, etc.[/quote]

You’re splitting the story into chapters. So you need to explain each section that you separated into more detail.

Read full topic

item.title: Rise and fall
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Yea sorry, wrote at 12am (my time :)) and in notepad++ cuz I haven’t reinstalled microsoft office yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Rise and fall
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

All right, I’m going to give it a shot, but don’t mind me too much if I make mistakes because We had exams at 6 am and our exams usually start at 12 am, plus it’s a vacation day so I’m not used to waking up so early.

But before I start…

[quote=“LilXCj, post:6, topic:379445”]Would love to point out grammar errors. I just don’t feel like highlighting this wall of text. There is are some sentences that make no sense.

[quote] At the same time as these immigrantsWeird transition into a new paragraph, crime was continuing to increase. People tricking others into
giving them items, or basic sleight of hand tricks, to make the value seem the same as offered, while it
may actually be incredibly lower. The country was in havock. These people, known as “scammers”, were the
other primary targets of this economic establishment Was there something supposed to go here? about to be made. This sentence can be worded better[/quote]

I could go all day.

EDIT: You asked for my opinion. :P[/quote]
grammar errurz.

Here goes…
@rey7x:

At the same time as these immigrants, crime was continuing to increase. People tricking others into giving them items, or basic sleight of hand tricks, to make the value seem the same as offered, while it may actually be incredibly lower. The country was in [b]havock[/b].
I believe that should be havoc?

Also, you’re using the past perfect too much, as in…

In October, government officials had officially decided pricing for every item that flowed through their economy, legal or not.

I believe it would be better if you do…

In October, government officials officially decided pricing for every item that flowed through their economy, legal or not.

Because the past perfect usually needs two events happening at two different times, as in

You had studied well before moving to New York.
also..
They said the resources [s]are[/s] [b]were[/b] for our people, not these slaves.
Scammers were furious, as now basic villagers could catch the [b]craftyness[/b] the scammers.
craftiness. Also, I believe you are missing an "of" between "craftiness" and "the scammers"
That didn't the dragons would give you their bones, but all killing of your own race must be stopped.
I believe you are missing "mean" between "That didn't" and "the dragons"?

You also use the future tense a lot, as in “our economy would be under complete control.”

If I were you, I would start the story using Past Perfect as to give the impression these evens happened in the past, then follow up with past simple.

A few I saw, then again I am a bit groggy so maybe I missed something.

Read full topic

giving them items, or basic sleight of hand tricks, to make the value seem the same as offered, while it
may actually be incredibly lower. The country was in havock. These people, known as “scammers”, were the
other primary targets of this economic establishment Was there something supposed to go here? about to be made. This sentence can be worded better[/quote]

I could go all day.

EDIT: You asked for my opinion. :P[/quote]

I know, because I know you’re one of the 10 people that give’s CC.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Would love to point out grammar errors. I just don’t feel like highlighting this wall of text. There is some sentences that make no sense.

[b]At the same time as these immigrants[/b][i]Weird transition into a new paragraph[/i], crime was continuing to increase. People tricking others into giving them items, or basic sleight of hand tricks, to make the value seem the same as offered, while it may actually be incredibly lower. The country was in [b]havock[/b]. These people, known as "scammers", were the other primary targets of this economic establishment [u]Was there something supposed to go here?[/u] about to be made. [i]This sentence can be worded better[/i]

I could go all day.

EDIT: You asked for my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Rise and fall
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:3, topic:379445”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=475289.msg3475560#msg3475560 date=1295669556]
Hmm

History of rs lol, i already noes bout all dis
[/quote]

Taken from the perspective of a player. When I get bored, I write.

Seriously, no. Gtfo.[/quote]
I still remember my FIRST trade, i didnt even know, till some stranger came up, then in the chat box i saw “forgotname whishes to trade with you”

Im like ooooooo

so i right click this person and see a trade option, im like “Wtf hax”
so i click this, and a interface comes up

I got so happy

I thought “This game has everything!”

And he gave me a diamond (uncut) for no reason whatsoever, and that diamond soon turned into more stuff…

I remember my first FREE trade, and i will now remember my first FREE trade, after runescape is reborn…

Read full topic

@reyx7 wrote:

[center]Ok, So I’ll be updating this topic as I continue to write more. Pretty much a free style of the past 3 years. Post criticism, comments, changes I could make, or just personal opinion. Enjoy.[/center]

[center]

[size=24pt]Rise and Fall[/size]
[size=18pt]A nations struggle to keep fighting[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]Chapter One
Uprise[/size][/center]

[center] December 7th, 2007. A day in history I will never forget. A day in which all our freedom was taken.

They wanted a country with a healthy, living, economy. Little did they know they where about to throw

For years now, illegal trades had been involved, which was said to be collapsing the economy. People

North of our civilized area is a land known as the "wilderness". It used be just like the rest of
